subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: In a highly anticipated matchup with nationalistic overtones, Canelo of Mexico, 25, won by a unanimous decision over Cotto, 35, of Puerto Rico, possibly setting up a title unification bout with Gennady Golovkin.
snippet: In a highly anticipated matchup with nationalistic overtones, Canelo of Mexico, 25, won by a unanimous decision over Cotto, 35, of Puerto Rico, possibly setting up a title unification bout with Gennady Golovkin.
